mapper.select: SELECT ps.ps_id, ps.pro_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_location, p.word_name, s.stu_name, t2.tutor_name AS prTutor, t3.tutor_name AS psTutor, pr.update_time AS prTime, ps.lx_flag, ps.update_time, t1.tutor_name AS paTutor, pa.update_time AS paTime FROM project p, project_approval pa LEFT JOIN tutor t1 ON pa.tutor_id = t1.tutor_id, project_review pr LEFT JOIN tutor t2 ON pr.tutor_id = t2.tutor_id, project_starting ps LEFT JOIN tutor t3 ON ps.tutor_id = t3.tutor_id, student s, clazz c, discipline d, faculty f WHERE pr.pro_id = p.pro_id AND pa.pro_id = p.pro_id AND ps.pro_id = p.pro_id AND p.stu_id = s.stu_id AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id AND c.disc_id = d.disc_id AND d.fac_id = f.fac_id AND pa.tutor_id IS NOT NULL AND p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pr.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pr.pass_flag = 0 AND f.fac_id = #{facId} ORDER BY pr.update_time DESC

SELECT p.pro_name, s.stu_name, t2.tutor_name AS prTutor, t3.tutor_name AS psTutor, pr.update_time AS prTime, ps.lx_flag, ps.update_time, t1.tutor_name AS paTutor, pa.update_time AS paTime FROM project p, project_approval pa LEFT JOIN tutor t1 ON pa.tutor_id = t1.tutor_id, project_review pr LEFT JOIN tutor t2 ON pr.tutor_id = t2.tutor_id, project_starting ps LEFT JOIN tutor t3 ON ps.tutor_id = t3.tutor_id, student s, clazz c, discipline d, faculty f WHERE pr.pro_id = p.pro_id AND pa.pro_id = p.pro_id AND ps.pro_id = p.pro_id AND p.stu_id = s.stu_id AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id AND c.disc_id = d.disc_id AND d.fac_id = f.fac_id AND pa.tutor_id IS NOT NULL AND p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pr.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pr.pass_flag = 0 AND f.fac_id = #{facId} ORDER BY pr.update_time DESC
